#summary Intermediate Language - Syntax
#labels Phase-Design,Phase-Implementation,Project-IL

{{{

/*

Commands

syntax = cmd	argument argument2 argument3

List

push = load value to stack
rfloc = load local to stack
rfarg = load arg to stack
wrloc = store to RAM
wrarg = store to RAM
call = call method
pop = pop <n> things
stack = create new stack
snail = ?
desnail = ?

Stack

note - ALL VALUES ARE HEX!!!

syntax:

type (1 byte), size (2^x), 1 byte
value

List/Examples

0000 = pointer
1C000000 = address (32bit [CPU])

0102 = 2^2byte Integer
49405464 (32bit)

0204 = 2^4byte Floating point
4.94065645841247x10-324

0300 = String
Bla\0 (null-terminated)

0400 = bool (false)

0401 = bool (true)

*/

namespace hello
{

  reference "corelib"
  {
    include namespace core
  }
  
  class one
  {
    
    method entrypoint main
    {
      ;	comment!
      push	int32 600
      wrloc	i
      push	string "Hello, World!"
      call	show(string)
      snail
      desnail
    }

    method show(string message)
    {

      ldarg	string message
      call	core.Console::out(string)
      ret
    
    }

  }

}

}}}
